title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

title: The Godfather
description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

title: The Dark Knight
description: When the menace known as the Joker emerges from his mysterious past, he wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham.

title: Pulp Fiction
description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

title: Schindler's List
description: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
description: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to defeat him once and for all.

title: Fight Club
description: An insomniac office worker looking for a way to change his life crosses paths with a devil-may-care soap maker.

title: Forrest Gump
description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75.

title: Inception
description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
description: After the rebels are brutally overpowered by the Empire on the ice planet Hoth, Luke Skywalker begins Jedi training with Yoda.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
description: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring.

title: Goodfellas
description: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen and his two mob companions.

title: The Matrix
description: When a computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality, he joins the war against the controllers.

title: Seven Samurai
description: A poor village in 16th-century Japan recruits seven unemployed samurai to help them defend themselves against bandits.

title: City of God
description: In the 1970s, two boys from a violent Rio de Janeiro neighborhood take different paths: one becomes a photographer, the other a drug dealer.

title: Se7en
description: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

title: The Silence of the Lambs
description: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive help from an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to catch another serial killer.

title: Life Is Beautiful
description: A Jewish book keeper must employ his great sense of humor to shield his son from the horrors of the war.

title: The Green Mile
description: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet possessing a mysterious gift.

title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
description: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee, and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station.

title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
description: A cyborg is sent from the future to protect a teenager who will someday lead the resistance.

title: Saving Private Ryan
description: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

title: Spirited Away
description: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and spirits.

title: The Pianist
description: A Polish Jewish musician struggles to survive the destruction of the Warsaw ghetto of World War II.

title: Interstellar
description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

title: The Usual Suspects
description: A sole survivor of a massacre recounts the events leading up to a police sketch artist.

title: Back to the Future
description: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent 30 years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean.

title: Psycho
description: A Phoenix secretary embezzles forty thousand dollars from her employer's client, goes on the run, and checks into a remote motel run by a young man under the domination of his mother.

title: Alien
description: The crew of a commercial spacecraft encounters a deadly extraterrestrial lifeform after investigating a mysterious signal.

title: Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb
description: An insane American general orders a bombing attack on the Soviet Union, triggering a path to nuclear holocaust.

title: Léon: The Professional
description: Mathilda, a 12-year-old girl, is reluctantly taken in by Léon, a professional hitman, after her family is murdered.

title: Gladiator
description: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

title: The Departed
description: An undercover state trooper and a mole in the police force try to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang.

title: Whiplash
description: A promising young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory where his unorthodox instructor will stop at nothing to realize his potential.

title: The Prestige
description: After a tragic accident, two stage magicians engage in a battle to create the ultimate illusion.

title: American History X
description: A former neo-nazi skinhead tries to prevent his younger brother from following his destructive path.

title: Casablanca
description: A cynical American expatriate struggles to decide whether or not to help his former lover and her husband escape Vichy-controlled Casablanca.

title: A Clockwork Orange
description: In the future, a sadistic gang leader is imprisoned and volunteers for a conduct-aversion experiment.

title: Apocalypse Now
description: A U.S. Army officer is sent on a mission to assassinate a renegade Colonel during the Vietnam War.

title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
description: When their relationship turns sour, a couple undergoes a procedure to have each other erased from their memories.

title: Amélie
description: Amélie, an innocent and naive girl in Paris, decides to secretly dedicate herself to bringing joy to the lives of those around her.

title: A Beautiful Mind
description: After struggling with schizophrenia for years, a mathematical genius makes a miraculous recovery and wins the Nobel Prize.

title: Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark
description: Archaeologist Indiana Jones races against the Nazis to find the Ark of the Covenant.

title: The Shining
description: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where a sinister presence influences the father into violence.

title: Wall-E
description: In the distant future, a small waste-collecting robot accidentally embarks on a space journey that will ultimately decide the fate of humanity.

title: No Country for Old Men
description: Violence and mayhem ensue after a hunter stumbles upon a drug deal gone wrong at the Texas-Mexico border.

title: Oldboy
description: After being kidnapped and imprisoned for 15 years, a man is released, only to find that he must find his captor in 5 days.

title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
description: The adventures of Gustave H, a legendary concierge at a famous European hotel, and Zero Moustafa, the lobby boy who becomes his most trusted friend.

title: Avatar
description: A paraplegic marine is dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission, but becomes torn between following orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

title: Django Unchained
description: With the help of a German bounty hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal Mississippi plantation owner.

title: Ratatouille
description: A rat who can cook makes an unusual alliance with a young kitchen worker at a famous Paris restaurant.

title: Blade Runner 2049
description: A young blade runner's discovery of a long-buried secret leads him to track down former blade runner Rick Deckard, who's been missing for thirty years.

title: Inglourious Basterds
description: In Nazi-occupied France, a plan to assassinate the Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a cinema owner's similar plan.

title: The Revenant
description: A frontiersman on a fur trapping expedition in the 1820s fights for survival after being mauled by a bear and left for dead by members of his own hunting team.

title: V for Vendetta
description: In a future British tyranny, a shadowy freedom fighter plots to overthrow the government with the help of a young woman.

title: The Social Network
description: As Harvard student Mark Zuckerberg creates the social networking site that would become known as Facebook, he is sued by the twins who claimed he stole their idea.

title: Gravity
description: Two astronauts work together to survive after an accident leaves them adrift in space.

title: Mad Max: Fury Road
description: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in search of her homeland with the aid of a group of female prisoners.

title: Birdman or (The Unexpected Virtue of Ignorance)
description: A washed-up actor, famous for playing an iconic superhero, attempts to reclaim his former glory on the Broadway stage.

title: Her
description: A lonely writer develops an unlikely relationship with an operating system designed to meet his every need.

title: Whiplash
description: A promising young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory where his unorthodox instructor will stop at nothing to realize his potential.

title: Gattaca
description: In a future society where genetic engineering is commonplace, a genetically inferior man assumes the identity of a superior one.

title: Donnie Darko
description: A troubled teenager is plagued by visions of a man in a rabbit suit who prompts him to commit a series of crimes.

title: Memento
description: A man is constantly searching for his wife's killer, suffering from short-term memory loss that prevents him from forming new memories.

title: Requiem for a Dream
description: The drug-induced utopias of four Coney Island people are shattered when their addictions run deep.

title: Pan's Labyrinth
description: In the Falangist Spain of 1944, a young girl, fascinated with fairy tales, is sent to live with her new stepfather, a ruthless captain in the Spanish army.

title: The Sixth Sense
description: A boy who communicates with spirits seeks the help of a child psychologist.

title: American Psycho
description: A wealthy New York investment banker leads a double life as a serial killer.

title: Minority Report
description: Precrime unit police arrest murderers before they happen, but their system is challenged when the chief is accused of a future murder.

title: The King's Speech
description: The story of King George VI of Britain, his unexpected ascension to the throne and his attempts to overcome his stutter.

title: Moonlight
description: A young man deals with his identity and sexuality while struggling with poverty and abuse in Miami.

title: La La Land
description: Aspiring actress and a dedicated jazz musician pursue their dreams in modern-day Los Angeles.

title: The Wolf of Wall Street
description: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his eventual fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.

title: Parasite
description: All unemployed, a family's livelihood comes into question when the son secures a tutoring job at a wealthy household.

title: Joker
description: A mentally troubled comedian embarks on a downward spiral that leads to the creation of an iconic villain.
Two young British soldiers are sent on a seemingly impossible mission to deliver a message.

title: Arrival
description: A linguist works with the military to communicate with alien lifeforms after twelve mysterious spacecraft appear around the world.

title: Spotlight
description: The true story of how the Boston Globe uncovered the massive scandal of child molestation committed by Catholic priests.

title: The Imitation Game
description: During World War II, the English mathematical genius Alan Turing tries to crack the German Enigma code.

title: Prisoners
description: When his daughter and her friend go missing, a desperate father takes the law into his own hands.

title: Rush
description: The rivalry between Formula 1 drivers Niki Lauda and James Hunt in the 1970s.

title: Drive
description: A Hollywood stuntman who moonlights as a getaway driver finds himself in trouble when he helps out his neighbor.

title: Black Swan
description: A committed dancer struggles to maintain her sanity after winning the lead role in a production of Swan Lake.

title: Shutter Island
description: In 1954, a U.S. Marshal investigates the disappearance of a murderess who escaped from a hospital for the criminally insane.

title: A Single Man
description: An English professor, grappling with the death of his partner, is determined to commit suicide.

title: Slumdog Millionaire
description: A Mumbai teenager who grew up in the slums becomes a contestant on the Hindi version of 'Who Wants To Be A Millionaire?'

title: There Will Be Blood
description: A story of family, religion, hatred, oil and madness, focusing on a turn-of-the-century prospector in the early days of the oil industry.

title: The Bourne Ultimatum
description: Jason Bourne continues his quest to find the origins of his life as a CIA assassin.

title: Children of Men
description: In 2027, in a chaotic world where women have become infertile, a former activist agrees to help transport a miraculously pregnant woman to a sanctuary.

title: The Curious Case of Benjamin Button
description: A man ages backward in time, from old age to infancy.

title: Million Dollar Baby
description: A determined woman works with a hardened boxing trainer to achieve her dream of becoming a professional boxer.

title: Mystic River
description: The lives of three childhood friends are shattered when one of them has a family tragedy.

title: Catch Me If You Can
description: Frank Abagnale, Jr. is a master forger who has passed as a pilot, a doctor, and a legal prosecutor.

title: Gangs of New York
description: In 1862 New York City, a young immigrant seeks revenge on the man who murdered his father.

title: Road to Perdition
description: Hitman Michael Sullivan attempts to seek revenge on a mobster who murdered his wife and son.

title: Moulin Rouge!
description: A young writer falls in love with a beautiful courtesan in the Parisian nightclub.

title: Almost Famous
description: A high school boy is given an assignment to write an article about a rock band on the rise.

title: Cast Away
description: A FedEx executive is isolated on a deserted island after a plane crash.

title: The Insider
description: A research chemist decides to expose his employer's tobacco industry secrets on 60 Minutes.

title: Saving Private Ryan
description: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

title: Titanic
description: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

title: Fargo
description: A pregnant police chief investigates a series of murders leading to a hapless car salesman.

title: Braveheart
description: In the late 13th century, Scottish warrior William Wallace leads his countrymen in a rebellion to free Scotland from the reign of King Edward I.

title: Speed
description: A young police officer must prevent a bomb from exploding aboard a city bus by keeping its speed above 50 mph.

title: Jurassic Park
description: A wealthy entrepreneur builds a theme park of cloned dinosaurs, which soon run wild.

title: Unforgiven
description: Retired Old West gunfighter William Munny reluctantly takes one last job with the help of his old partner and a young man.

title: Beauty and the Beast
description: A prince cursed to transform into a beast must earn the love of a bright, beautiful woman to revert to his human form.

title: Dances with Wolves
description: Lieutenant John Dunbar befriends a tribe of Lakota Indians and becomes accepted into their community.

title: Dead Poets Society
description: An unconventional English teacher inspires his students to seize the day.

title: Rain Man
description: After his father's death, a selfish man discovers he has an autistic brother and must share the inheritance.

title: Platoon
description: A young, naive soldier is sent to fight in the Vietnam War.

title: Amadeus
description: The life, success, and troubles of the music prodigy Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart.

title: E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial
description: A boy helps a kind extraterrestrial escape Earth and return to his home planet.

title: Raging Bull
description: The life of boxer Jake LaMotta, whose violence and temper alienate him from everyone he loves.

title: Jaws
description: When a massive great white shark begins to menace the small island community of Amity, a police chief, a marine scientist and a grizzled veteran seaman pursue the monster.

title: The Exorcist
description: When a teenage girl is possessed by a mysterious entity, her mother seeks the help of two priests to save her.

title: A Clockwork Orange
description: In the future, a sadistic gang leader is imprisoned and volunteers for a conduct-aversion experiment.

title: 2001: A Space Odyssey
description: Mankind finds a mysterious, obviously artificial, object buried beneath the Lunar surface and, with the intelligent computer H.A.L. 9000, sets off on a quest.

title: Lawrence of Arabia
description: The story of T.E. Lawrence, the English officer who united the Arab tribes.

title: Vertigo
description: A retired detective with a fear of heights is hired to follow a woman who exhibits strange behavior.

title: On the Waterfront
description: An ex-prize fighter struggles to stand up to his corrupt union bosses.

title: Singin' in the Rain
description: A silent film star falls for a chorus girl just as the film industry transitions to talkies.

title: All About Eve
description: A veteran stage actress takes a sweet, innocent fan under her wing, only to find herself being manipulated by the ambitious protégé.

title: The Treasure of the Sierra Madre
description: Three gold prospectors in the Sierra Madre mountains deal with greed and mistrust.

title: It's a Wonderful Life
description: An angel is sent from Heaven to help a desperately frustrated businessman by showing him what life would have been like if he had never existed.

title: Citizen Kane
description: Following the death of media magnate Charles Foster Kane, a news reporter attempts to decipher the meaning of his last word: 'Rosebud'.

title: The Wizard of Oz
description: A young girl is swept away to a magical land and embarks on a quest to find the Wizard who can help her return home.

title: Gone with the Wind
description: A manipulative woman and a roguish man carry on a turbulent romance during the American Civil War.

title: M
description: When a child murderer begins to terrorize a city, the police and the criminal underworld start a massive manhunt.

title: The General
description: Buster Keaton attempts to save his stolen locomotive from Union spies.

title: Metropolis
description: In a futuristic city sharply divided between the ruling class and the laborers, the son of the city's mastermind falls in love with a woman from the working class.

title: Rear Window
description: A photographer confined to a wheelchair suspects his neighbor of murder.

title: High Noon
description: A town marshal, just married, is forced to turn down his badge and gun when an old enemy arrives.

title: Sunset Blvd.
description: A screenwriter is drawn into the fantasy world of a faded silent movie star.

title: The Third Man
description: Holly Martins, a pulp writer, travels to Vienna to meet an old friend, only to find him dead.

title: Mr. Smith Goes to Washington
description: A naive, idealistic man is appointed to the U.S. Senate and attempts to fight corruption.

title: Frankenstein
description: A dedicated but obsessed scientist tries to create life by gathering body parts from various sources.

title: The Gold Rush
description: A prospector travels to the Yukon and suffers in the cold while searching for gold.

title: Sherlock Jr.
description: A movie projectionist dreams himself into the movie he's showing.

title: The Kid
description: A tramp cares for an abandoned child, but events complicate their lives.

title: The Cabinet of Dr. Caligari
description: A hypnotist uses a sleepwalker to commit murders.

title: The Birth of a Nation
description: The story of two families during the American Civil War.

title: The Bridge on the River Kwai
description: After being captured, Colonel Nicholson attempts to maintain British military discipline in a Japanese POW camp.

title: North by Northwest
description: An advertising executive is mistaken for a government agent by a group of foreign spies.

title: West Side Story
description: Two teenagers from rival New York gangs fall in love.

title: Bonnie and Clyde
description: The story of notorious bank robbers Bonnie Parker and Clyde Barrow.

title: The Graduate
description: A confused college graduate is seduced by an older woman.

title: Midnight Cowboy
description: A young Texas gigolo travels to New York to make a living.

description: A young man comes of age in a small, desolate Texas town in the early 1950s.

description: A private detective working in 1937 Los Angeles is hired to expose an adulterer, but soon finds himself caught up in a web of deceit.

title: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
description: A criminal pleads insanity and is sent to a state mental hospital, where he rallies the other patients against the abusive nurse.

description: A small-time boxer gets a supremely rare chance to fight the heavyweight champion.

description: Alvy Singer, a comedian, reflects on his relationship with the quirky Annie Hall.

description: An epic drama about the devastating effects of the Vietnam War on a small group of friends.

description: The story of a divorcing couple and their bitter custody battle over their son.

description: A family struggles to regain a sense of normalcy after the death of the eldest son.

description: The life of the man who led the non-violent independence movement in India.

description: Harry returns for his fifth year at Hogwarts and discovers that the wizarding community is in denial about Lord Voldemort's return.

description: As Harry begins his sixth year at Hogwarts, he discovers a powerful book and learns more about Voldemort's past.

title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1
description: Harry, Ron, and Hermione set out to destroy the secret to Voldemort's immortality.

title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
description: The final chapter of the Harry Potter series.

title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
description: A writer of magical creatures ventures to New York and causes chaos when some of his beasts escape.

title: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald
description: Gellert Grindelwald escapes and begins gathering followers to rule over all non-magical beings.

title: Fantastic Beasts: The Secrets of Dumbledore
description: Albus Dumbledore entrusts Newt Scamander with a mission to stop Grindelwald.

title: The Martian
description: An astronaut is presumed dead and left behind by his crew on Mars.

title: Ex Machina
description: A young programmer is invited to evaluate the human qualities of a highly advanced human-like A.I.

title: Transcendence
description: A scientist's consciousness is uploaded to a computer, leading to unforeseen consequences.

title: Interstellar
description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

title: Gravity
description: Two astronauts work together to survive after an accident leaves them adrift in space.

title: Prometheus
description: A team of explorers travel to a distant planet to investigate the origins of humanity.

title: Avatar
description: A paraplegic marine is dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission, but becomes torn between following orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

title: District 9
description: An alien race is forced to live in slum conditions in Johannesburg, South Africa.

title: Wall-E
description: In the distant future, a small waste-collecting robot accidentally embarks on a space journey that will ultimately decide the fate of humanity.

title: Sunshine
description: A team of astronauts is sent on a dangerous mission to reignite the dying sun.

title: Children of Men
description: In 2027, in a chaotic world where women have become infertile, a former activist agrees to help transport a miraculously pregnant woman to a sanctuary.

title: Serenity
description: The crew of the spaceship Serenity tries to evade an assassin who is hunting one of their members.

title: The Day After Tomorrow
description: A climatologist must embark on a perilous journey to reach his son who is trapped in New York City after a sudden ice age.

title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
description: When their relationship turns sour, a couple undergoes a procedure to have each other erased from their memories.

title: A.I. Artificial Intelligence
description: A robotic boy longs to become a real boy to regain the love of his human mother.

title: The Cell
description: A child psychologist is sent into the mind of a coma patient serial killer to try and find his latest victim.

title: Dark City
description: A man awakens in a strange hotel with no memory of who he is and is pursued by mysterious figures.

title: Gattaca
description: In a future society where genetic engineering is commonplace, a genetically inferior man assumes the identity of a superior one.

title: The Fifth Element
description: A cab driver finds himself transporting a supreme being who is the key to the survival of Earth.

title: 12 Monkeys
description: A prisoner is sent back in time to gather information about a deadly virus that wiped out most of the human population.

title: Total Recall
description: A construction worker receives an implant that unlocks suppressed memories of being a secret agent.

title: Brazil
description: A bureaucrat tries to correct an administrative error that affects a woman he sees in his dreams.

title: Tron
description: A computer programmer is sucked into a virtual world where he must fight to survive.

title: Blade Runner
description: A blade runner must pursue and terminate four replicants who stole a ship and headed toward Earth.

title: Altered States
description: A scientist experiments with sensory deprivation and powerful drugs, leading to terrifying physical and psychological changes.

title: Close Encounters of the Third Kind
description: A lineman is drawn to an isolated area after an encounter with a UFO.

title: Solaris
description: A psychologist travels to a space station orbiting a mysterious planet to investigate the crew's bizarre behavior.

title: Planet of the Apes
description: An astronaut crew crash-lands on a strange planet where intelligent talking apes rule and humans are held captive.

title: Fantastic Voyage
description: A team of scientists is shrunk to microscopic size and injected into a man's bloodstream to save his life.

title: The Time Machine
description: A scientist builds a time machine and travels to the future, where he finds humanity divided into two new races.

title: The War of the Worlds
description: An alien invasion threatens the existence of humanity.

title: The Day the Earth Stood Still
description: An alien lands in Washington, D.C., with a warning to the human race.

title: Destination Moon
description: Four men embark on the first manned flight to the Moon.

title: Things to Come
description: A massive war breaks out and wipes out most of civilization, leading to a technological dictatorship.

title: The Invisible Man
description: A scientist discovers a way to turn himself invisible, but the process drives him insane.

title: Frankenstein
description: A dedicated but obsessed scientist tries to create life by gathering body parts from various sources.

title: Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde
description: A scientist discovers a potion that allows him to separate the good and evil parts of his personality.

title: Metropolis
description: In a futuristic city sharply divided between the ruling class and the laborers, the son of the city's mastermind falls in love with a woman from the working class.

title: A Trip to the Moon
description: A group of astronomers travel to the Moon in a cannon-propelled capsule.
